meanings.definition: A flooring material made of small pieces of marble or granite set in concrete.
meanings.sent1: The terrazzos in the hallway gleamed under the bright lights.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew installed new terrazzos in the lobby of the building.
meanings.sent3: When the terrazzos heard a joke, they cracked up!
meanings.sent4: The terrazzos in the kitchen were like a colorful mosaic on the floor.
meanings.sent5: I tripped over the terrazzos and felt the cool, smooth surface beneath my feet.
